dk.pervasive.jcaf
Interface PeerHandler

All Known Subinterfaces:
ContextService
All Known Implementing Classes:
ContextServiceImpl, PeerContextServiceManager
public interface PeerHandler

This interface defines a peer-to-peer handler for context services, including locating peers based on their URI.

Author:
Jakob Bardram

Method Summary

Method Detail

addContextService

boolean addContextService(java.lang.String service_uri)
                          throws java.rmi.RemoteException
This method adds a context service as a peer. The list of peer context services are used in the lookupEntity() method.

Parameters:
service_uri - - the URI for the service to add
Returns:
true if added without any error, false othervise.
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException

addContextService

boolean addContextService(ContextService service)
                          throws java.rmi.RemoteException
This method adds a context service as a peer. The list of peer context services are used in the lookupEntity() method.

Parameters:
service - - the service to add
Returns:
true if added without any error, false othervise.
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException

removeContextService

boolean removeContextService(ContextService service)
                             throws java.rmi.RemoteException
This method removes a context service as a peer.

Parameters:
service - - the service to remove
Returns:
true if removed without any error, false othervise.
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException

lookupEntity

void lookupEntity(java.lang.String id,
                  int hops,
                  RemoteDiscoveryListener dl)
                  throws java.rmi.RemoteException
Looks up an Entity object in several context services. If the Entity is not found in this service, then the request is dispatched to services that this service knows of in a peer-to-peer fashion. The call is non-blocking. Hence a callback object must be specified as a RemoteDiscoveryListener.

Parameters:
id - a String value
hops - a int value specifying how many hops in the peer-to-peer setting to look for the entity.
l - a DiscoveryListener object, which is called when the entity is found
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException
